resources.string: I don not know what to do!
Invalid input! \n Time must be a positive integer!
You are very beautiful, but there are no compliments to show!\nLike a hated compliment or enter your own!
Would you want to like the compliment? \n
It was removed from the list of hated compliments!
I have a compliment for you!

string-array.name: compliments_array
string-array.item: "You're beautiful, it's true!"
"For me your smile is like the sunrise for the flowers!"
"Your beauty left me breathless!"
"You are more beautiful than the roses, because the roses have thorns!"
"If I have to say how much I love you from one to ten I would say thirteen"
"God has created you to show that he can do wonders!"
"Without you I feel half a person!"
"Forever is not enough to love you!"
"Without you, I see no reason to live!"
"If someone gives me a penny every time I think of you, I would be a billionaire!"
"When you are around me, nothing else matters!"
"I am addicted to you and I can not stop loving you!"
"I think we will grow old together!"
"I feel grateful when I see you looking at me!"
"You look great whether you are wearing something or not!"
"You are the definition of a woman!"
"Please tell me how can I fall in love with you every time I see you!"
"I love every second spent with you!"
"I realized that when I hug you I hold the best thing!"
"I can not wait to wake up to see your face!"
"You are beautiful in a million different ways!"
"All I want in life is you!"
"You are so unique!"
"You are the best version of yourself!"
"You are the best woman that someone might want!"
"I wish I was half as good as you!"
"If you ask me what I like most about you. I will answer EVERYTHING!"
"You give the best ideas!"
"Everything looks good when you are wearing it!"
"You should be tired because you are constantly running through my mind!"
"I will freeze not due to sickness, but because I am stunned by your beauty!"
"You have two of the most beautiful hands I have ever seen!"
"You are sweeter than a huge bucket of chocolate!"
"Is it so hot in here or I am just getting hot when you are around!"
"Being fabulous is so difficult, but you are doing so great!"
"Your smile can illuminate the whole universe!"
"You are the sun in my dreams!"
"It is impossible to think of a compliment worthy enough for you!"
"Without you I am like shoe ties without shoes and like a sentence without spaces!"
"Your voice is music to my ears!"
"I need you more than air!"
"You deserve all the compliments in the world!"
"The world would be a better place if more people were like you!"
"The flowers smell better when they are in your hand!"
"You are my reason to feel love!"
"You are more pleasant than a fairy tale with a happy ending!"
"Let me be your hero, for you I am ready to die in battle!"
"I can not take my eyes off of you!"
"Your smile shines brighter than a diamond!"
"You took my heart and my thoughts. Please take care of them well!"

resources.string: Input values can not be empty!
Could not save the message in sent messages!

string-array.name: surprises
string-array.item: @string/surprise_option_every_day
